# heartjure ❤️ ⚡️

Welcome stranger,

The following book encompasses a small study over
one of Kaggle's [Heart Attack datasets](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/rashikrahmanpritom/heart-attack-analysis-prediction-dataset)

It's a domain that's very well studied. I am not seeking
to produce any groundbreaking findings here but
just to make a few nice visualisations and perhaps fit
a few good models for the purposes to showcase my data
science and machine learning skills
